Text: This movie is on my ''100 greatest of all time'' chart.

Apart from the retrospective files, the main film file has embedded English running commentary throughout the entire film from a film critic over the Swedish original audio, making it impossible to view and enjoy.

@sparky65 
Use a program like VLC media player that allows you to choose which audio file you want to listen to and the movie will be perfectly watchable.
Wonderful! I've wanted to see this for a long time.
Great quality, and a film worth watching.  Thanks for the upload.
